title: Ep 94 | Phil Sums Up What Would Happen if He Saw Jesus
description:
Phil, Jase, Al, and guest Zach Dasher discuss miracles, disbelief, deepfakes, and focusing on the Lord of the words instead of the words of the Lord. Phil imagines what would happen if he told the world he saw Jesus. Zach explains why people really come to Jesus. Jase poses a revealing question: Would a miracle change your life? And Al teases a big Robertson reveal on the next podcast.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
